Text: This one has a virus. If you have a good virus checker like Avast, you can clean it up without infecting your system, but it's probably best to stay away from this one.

Excuse me?????? What do you base that statement on? I guarantee that there's no virus... I used this installer myself and it works PERFECT. (-_-")
You just want to advertise Avast. Don't listen to this guy.

Trust me, I have no interest in promoting any anti-virus checker. But I've downloaded two different go games, and they both were flagged as containing a trojan virus. I'm not sure what to say; I'm just reporting what my AV program identified. If it's wrong, so be it. But I'm not willing to take a chance just because some anonymous person on the Internet tells me it's safe.
I just d/l this and my av found nothing wrong with these programs
